string.value: You should talk to #b#p1202002##k on your way back to town.
#p1202002# tells you it's an honor to meet a real hero and pleads with you to say hello to his brother #b#p1202003##k, who's also eager to meet a hero.
#p1202003# said that a true hero should never be without a weapon and gave you a sword. A hero without a weapon? Were you really a hero to begin with?
I just heard someone say, 'The hero has returned!' Did I hear wrong, or is it…is it really true? So this…this person standing before me is the hero?!
Oh this is unreal… I can't believe I am staring right at a hero of Maple World! It's an honor! Here, let me shake your hand…and if you could give me a hug... Hehe, could you please sign this, too?
Ah, I'm so sorry. I was so happy to have finally met you that I guess I got a little carried away. Whew, deep breaths. Deep breaths. Okay, I feel better now. But um…can I ask you a favor? Please?
My brother #b#p1202003##k is just down the street, and he's been dying to meet you! I know you're busy, but could you please stop by and say hello to #p1202003#? Please…
Ah, okay. I understand. Heroes are very busy. *Sniff…* If you ever get any free time, though...
You haven't talked to #b#p1202003##k yet? He's riiight there. Are you nervous about approching a fan? I never knew heroes could be so shy…
